properties.name: custom.audience
properties.description: Expected JWT audience for this service (used in security checks).

properties.name: custom.kc.token-endpoint
properties.description: Keycloak token endpoint URL for token exchange and client credentials.

properties.name: custom.kc.client-id
properties.description: Confidential client ID used by this service to talk to Keycloak.

properties.name: custom.kc.client-secret
properties.description: Secret for the above client. Inject via env/secret only.

properties.name: custom.user.audience
properties.description: Audience to request when exchanging tokens to call user-service.
